[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Schema: DagVoteSchema] [Vote spam] Can attackers flood the vote schema with votes for future rounds/epochs, exhausting storage before those rounds are reached? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Schema: CertifiedNodeSchema] [Certification spam] Can malicious nodes store fake certified nodes (with invalid signatures) to fill up storage, even if they're never used? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Function: Node::encode_value()] [Compression ratio] Can attackers craft nodes that compress poorly or expand massively during BCS encoding, causing storage amplification attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All decode functions] [Decode performance] Can specially crafted BCS data cause pathological decode performance, slowing down validators during sync or recovery? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All schemas] [Query performance] Can attackers craft storage patterns that cause worst-case query performance, slowing down consensus operations? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All schemas] [Sync consistency] During state sync, can schemas be downloaded in inconsistent orders causing nodes to reference votes or certified nodes that don't exist yet? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Schema: CertifiedNodeSchema] [Partial sync] Can partial downloads of CertifiedNodeSchema result in incomplete DAG history that prevents proper consensus participation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Schema: DagVoteSchema] [Vote sync] Are votes synchronized along with nodes, or can nodes be synced without their supporting votes, breaking verification? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All schemas] [Snapshot consistency] Do database snapshots capture all three schemas at the same logical point in time, or can snapshots be inconsistent? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All schemas] [Reorg handling] During DAG reorganizations, can orphaned data in schemas cause memory leaks or incorrect state transitions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Import: ensure_slice_len_eq] [Validation bypass] Can the ensure_slice_len_eq function at line 8 be bypassed if it has logic errors in its implementation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Macro: define_schema!] [Code injection] Can the define_schema! macro at line 10 be exploited through malicious inputs to generate unsafe code? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Import: Node/NodeId/CertifiedNode/Vote] [Type vulnerabilities] If imported types from dag module have vulnerabilities, do the schemas propagate or amplify those vulnerabilities? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Import: HashValue] [Crypto dependency] Is the HashValue type cryptographically secure, or could weaknesses in its implementation compromise schema security? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Import: aptos_schemadb] [Database abstraction] Can vulnerabilities in the underlying aptos_schemadb crate compromise schema security through abstraction leaks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All schemas] [Field addition] If new fields are added to Node/Vote/CertifiedNode types, can old serialized data be deserialized correctly, or will it cause migration failures? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All schemas] [Field removal] If fields are removed from stored types, can old data with those fields still be read, or will it cause consensus halt? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Schema: NodeSchema] [Column family rename] If NODE_CF_NAME at line 20 is changed in an upgrade, can the old data be migrated without data loss? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All encode/decode] [BCS version changes] If BCS encoding format changes between versions, can it cause cross-version incompatibility during rolling upgrades? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All schemas] [Data migration] Is there a migration path if schema structure needs to change fundamentally, or would it require resync from genesis? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Schema: NodeSchema with unit key] [Test coverage] Are there tests validating that unit key `()` actually works correctly for storing multiple nodes, or is this a fundamental design flaw? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [All encode/decode] [Fuzz testing] Have encode/decode functions been fuzz tested with malformed BCS data to ensure they don't panic or have memory safety issues? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Function: NodeId::encode_key() and decode_key()] [Round-trip testing] Are there tests ensuring encode->decode round-trips produce identical NodeId values in all edge cases? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensusdb/schema/dag/mod.rs] [Function: HashValue::from_slice()] [Boundary testing] Are there tests for HashValue deserialization with slices of length 0, 1, 31, 32, 33, and large sizes? (Medium)
